title: Suite Escape on the Striking WA Coast
description: Discover the natural wonders of Western Australia with a visit to the spectacular Kalbarri National Park - home to incredible walking trails, abseiling spots, over 800 species of wildflowers, picturesque beaches and some of the country’s best diving spots. Enjoy a two, four or five-night stay at Kalbarri Edge Resort with a daily buffet breakfast serving up a spread of continental favourites.

title: Suite Escape on the Striking WA Coast
description: Discover the natural wonders of Western Australia with a visit to the spectacular Kalbarri National Park - home to incredible walking trails, abseiling spots, over 800 species of wildflowers, picturesque beaches and some of the country’s best diving locations.
